commit_msg:
Attempt to fix flaky test by fixing random seed in n_qubit_tomography_test.py (#2758)

It seems the test can be a bit flaky
https://travis-ci.com/quantumlib/Cirq/jobs/285096296

Happy to modify or outright withdraw if this is misguided.
author_comment: The test are labelled as flaky in the sense they take too long to execute (due to the randomness), the solution is to add a random seed to avoid randomness and create circuits which execute in shorter time.
